Average Rating: 4.0
Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '1 x 1 x 2 inches; 1.6 Ounces', 'UPC': '733074272959'}
Review Text: I love the smell and started using it the same day I received it, 1 March 2018, and mixed it with other oils, and to help with my scalp and skin problems. It is a little hard to open after opening the top (cap).
Review Title: Great product
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Hair Oil Treatment Spray for Dry & Damaged Hair. Hydrate Dry Scalp, Control Frizz, Moisturize Thin Hair, Promote Hair Growth. All-Natural & Organic Hair Revitalizer for Men / Women, 4oz Spray
Review Date: 2018/03/03
Store: Natura Bona
Product Description: ['Natura Bona Hair Revitalizer Ingredients:', 'Oil', 'promotes healthy scalp & promotes hair growth.', 'Coconut Oil', 'stimulates hair growth, promotes a healthy scalp & adds luster.', 'Jojoba Oil', 'moisturizes hair, follicles & helps hair cells to reproduce.', 'Castor Oil', 'has natural properties that help hair grow thicker.', 'Neem Oil', 'promotes hair growth, soothe scalp & prevents dryness.', 'Avocado Oi', 'l', 'is a rich natural emollient with rich vitamins. Leaves hair soft & hydrated.', 'Cypress Oil', 'can increase head blood circulation & capillary strength which stimulates hair follicles for optimal hair growth.', 'Cedarwood Oil', 'balances the oil producing glands of scalp.', 'Peppermint Oil', 'Revitalizes hair follicles that stimulate hair growth.', 'Lavender Oil', 'moisturizes the scalp & promotes hair growth.', 'Clove Oil', 'boosts scalp blood circulation helping to reduce hair loss.', 'Rosemary Oil', 'is packed with ingredients that helps with thinning/graying hair.', 'Tea Tree Oil', 'moisturizes the scalp & relieves itching.', 'Clary Sage Oil', 'helps manage curly/frizzy hair, promotes hair growth & reverse premature balding.', 'Patchouli Oil', 'contains natural properties that help with hair issues than can be the underlying cause of hair loss.', 'Eucalyptus Oil', 'helps combat itchy skin.', 'Ylang-Ylang Oil', 'fights dry & itchy scalp due to inadequate sebum production that can lead to hair loss.', 'Roman Chamomile Oil', 'conditions hair & relieves dry scalp.', 'Vetiver Oil', 'aids in the reduction of hair loss resulting from heat & also thwarts the premature aging of hair follicles.']
Average Rating: 2.6
Product Details: {'Hair Type': 'Damaged', 'Scent': 'Hair Revitalizer Oil', 'Liquid Volume': '4 Fluid Ounces', 'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Brand': 'Natura Bona', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'UPC': '728072517591', 'Manufacturer': 'Natura Bona'}
Review Text: I'm glad that it came on time and in perfect condition. I bought it for my frizz and for my flaky scalp, and to reduce and prevent dandruff, also to condition my hear. Thanks Natura Bona and PerfumeStudio.
Review Title: Excellent
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

Average Rating: 4.5

Review Text: Soothes my itching and other things. I love the smell of Manuka, Lavender and other oils.
Review Title: Great product
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

Review Date: 2018/12/04
Store: drTung's
Product Description: ["DrTung's Oil Pulling Concentrate is a time-tested remedy of 24 carefully chosen plants and herbs. This organic sesame oil ‘swish’ is created from an ancient formula in Ayurvedic texts. The mainly wildcrafted ingredients are carefully prepared in organic sesame oil. This herbalized treatment was carefully crafted to help strengthen your teeth and gums as well as help detoxify and balance oral flora. Give your mouth a nourishing and conditioning cleanse with DrTung's!"]
Average Rating: 4.5

raw_response:
SUMMARY:
This individual's purchasing behavior reflects a strong preference for natural and organic personal care products, particularly those that focus on skincare and haircare. Consistent high ratings (around 4.0 to 5.0) indicate satisfaction with product efficacy, especially regarding treatments for scalp and hair issues. The user often seeks products that promise hydration, frizz control, and overall hair growth, suggesting a greater care for hair vitality and scalp health.

A recurring theme is the use of Manuka oil, which is appreciated for its soothing properties and pleasant scent. This indicates a preference for scents that are herbal or floral, aligning with interests in holistic or Ayurvedic methodologies.

Quality is prioritized over price sensitivity; the user shows willingness to invest in premium products that deliver on performance, further illustrated by their satisfaction despite mixed reviews on some items. Products with substantial natural ingredients are favored, suggesting a trend toward clean beauty standards.

Overall, the core preferences discerned include a high regard for natural ingredients, effective hydration solutions for hair and scalp, and a keen interest in products with therapeutic benefits. The combination of these factors points to an ongoing commitment to self-care through quality, organic personal care items.
